# Wisdom Obioma — Frontend Engineer

> Frontend Engineer with 5 years of experience building performant, accessible, and deeply engaging web applications.

## About

Wisdom Obioma is a Frontend Engineer based in Lagos, Nigeria. He specialises in React, Next.js, and TypeScript, with a track record across startups and larger organisations — handling everything from translating design mockups to shipping production-ready code. He works closely with designers, product managers, and backend engineers to build things that are clean, accessible, and polished.

## Skills & Expertise

- **Languages**: TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
- **Frameworks & Libraries**: React, Next.js, Framer Motion, Tailwind CSS
- **CMS**: Sanity CMS
- **Tooling**: Vercel, Git, Figma
- **Focus Areas**: Performance optimisation, accessibility (a11y), design systems, UI engineering

## Projects & Writing

Selected work and writing are listed on the homepage at https://wisdomobioma.com. Projects include client work across startups and personal builds spanning UI, tooling, and full-stack applications.

## Contact

- **Email**: wisdomobiomadev@gmail.com
- **Schedule a call**: https://calendar.app.google/EsoHLJeBiqfiUGZT6
- **Website**: https://wisdomobioma.com
